alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 7:31AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT JEFFERSON...LEWIS AND OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 9 AM TO 10 AM... At 727 AM EST, moderate to at times heavy snow was falling across the North Country. The back edge of the steadier snow was located along a line extending from 25 miles west of Cedar Point State Park to near Fulton. This back edge was moving east at 30-40 mph. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Stony Point, Carthage, Lowville, Pulaski, West Carthage, Clayton, Central Square, Adams, Dexter, Redfield, Glen Park, Herrings, Kring Point State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Adams Center and Nine Mile Point. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 51. The snow can accumulate at a rate of one inch per hour or more in this area of heavy snow. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions as snow accumulates on untreated roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
